issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Add null count column statistics
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11018](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11018). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add option to provide column statistics, on null count first.

This is one important step to provide more advanced cost based optimization.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11018?focusedCommentId=17255214) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8998
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8998>
